nodes.text: No wonder Sinn Fein/RA continues to step up its demands.
It has been trained to do so by the Government.
If Sinn Fein/IRA has been trained to step up its demands it is no wonder it continues to do so.
experience tells us that there is almost no terrorist demand to which Mr Blair is unprepared to yield in order to preserve the fragile peace in Northern Ireland.

If experience tells us that there is almost no terrorist demand to which Mr. Blair is unprepared to yield in order to preserve the peace the IRA has been trained by the Government to step up its demands.
